value.title: The Silliest Planetary Fortress Rush EVER | Florencio Files #279 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I cast one of the mysterious and deranged StarCraft 2 builds of the one and only, Florencio, the dude that invented the Protoss proxy nexus recall rush. In this episode, the Sewer Mermaid has a very good strat that deals a lot of damage. But is it enough against such a good opponent?  üßúFlorencio Files
